statements: SELECT * FROM assembly_line_metrics;
SELECT line_id, product_id, production_rate FROM assembly_line_metrics;
SELECT efficiency_score, product_id, line_id FROM assembly_line_metrics;
SELECT * FROM assembly_line_metrics WHERE line_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, efficiency_score FROM assembly_line_metrics WHERE production_rate > 1000;
SELECT * FROM assembly_line_metrics WHERE line_id = 3;
SELECT product_id, efficiency_score FROM assembly_line_metrics WHERE production_rate > 50 ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, AVG(production_rate) AS avg_production_rate FROM assembly_line_metrics GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT line_id, production_rate FROM assembly_line_metrics WHERE efficiency_score < 0.8 ORDER BY production_rate ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(production_rate) AS avg_production_rate, MAX(efficiency_score) AS max_efficiency_score FROM assembly_line_metrics;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT id, efficiency FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT production_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE id = 3;
SELECT assembly_line_id, defect_type, timestamp FROM assembly_line_quality WHERE defect_type = 'critical' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(error_rate) AS average_error_rate FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY production_rate DESC
SELECT id, production_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE error_rate < 0.05
SELECT * FROM assembly_line_quality WHERE defect_type = 'Electrical' AND repair_time > 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT AVG(production_rate) AS average_production_rate FROM performance_metrics
SELECT p.id, p.efficiency, a.defect_type FROM performance_metrics p JOIN assembly_line_quality a ON p.id = a.assembly_line_id
SELECT id, production_rate FROM assembly_line_performance ORDER BY production_rate DESC;
SELECT assembly_line_id, efficiency FROM assembly_line_performance WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT id, defect_type FROM quality_control WHERE defect_count > 10 ORDER BY defect_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM process_improvement WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assembly_line_id, improvement_area FROM process_improvement WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM assembly_line_performance WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT id, assembly_line_id, production_rate FROM assembly_line_performance WHERE production_rate < 100;
SELECT assembly_line_id, SUM(defect_count) AS total_defects FROM quality_control GROUP BY assembly_line_id;
SELECT assembly_line_id, AVG(efficiency) AS average_efficiency FROM assembly_line_performance GROUP BY assembly_line_id;

SELECT p.improvement_area, i.implementation_date, a.production_rate FROM process_improvement p JOIN assembly_line_performance a ON p.assembly_line_id = a.assembly_line_id WHERE a.production_rate > 50;
SELECT efficiency, productivity FROM assembly_line_performance_metrics;
SELECT line_id, efficiency, quality_score FROM assembly_line_performance_metrics ORDER BY quality_score DESC;
SELECT operator_id, operator_name, shift_start, shift_end FROM line_operators WHERE line_id = 2;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'preventive';
SELECT defect_id, defect_description, detection_timestamp FROM defect_tracking WHERE line_id = 3 ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT line_id, efficiency, productivity, quality_score FROM assembly_line_performance_metrics WHERE line_id = 1;
SELECT operator_name, shift_start, shift_end FROM line_operators WHERE shift_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT defect_description, detection_timestamp FROM defect_tracking WHERE defect_id > 100 ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT line_id, efficiency, quality_score FROM assembly_line_performance_metrics WHERE efficiency > 0.8 AND quality_score < 80;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS total_occurrences FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY maintenance_type ORDER BY total_occurrences DESC;
SELECT * FROM assembly_line_metrics;
SELECT id, date, productivity FROM defect_tracking WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT defect_type, quantity FROM defect_tracking ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, line_id, date, efficiency FROM machine_status WHERE status = 'Running';
SELECT * FROM quality_assurance WHERE passed = TRUE ORDER BY inspector_id, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assembly_line_metrics WHERE line_id = 1;
SELECT defect_type, quantity FROM defect_tracking WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT line_id, date, efficiency FROM assembly_line_metrics WHERE efficiency > 0.8 AND productivity > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT defect_type, COUNT(*) as total_defects FROM defect_tracking GROUP BY defect_type ORDER BY total_defects DESC;
SELECT employee_id, date, efficiency_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE efficiency_rating <= 0.5 AND errors > 10 ORDER BY date DESC;
